meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ureide to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: The ureide was found in the laboratory samples.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled when they learned about the ureide in their chemistry class.
meanings.sent4: The ureide acted like a secret code, unlocking the mysteries of the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The bright white color of the ureide made it easy to spot in the mixture.

meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing the ureide group.
meanings.sent1: Many researchers are exploring the different types of ureides in nature.
meanings.sent2: The textbook explained the characteristics of ureides in detail.
meanings.sent3: The chef jokingly called the dish a 'ureide medley' to impress the guests.
meanings.sent4: The ureide group in the molecules was like a signature that identified them.
meanings.sent5: The unique smell of the ureides filled the laboratory with a distinct aroma.
